meanings: [명사] threat, blackmail, (위협) intimidation, (formal) duress, [동사] threaten, blackmail[intimidate] (sb into doing)

vlive.korean: 이건 협박 아닌가요? Isn't this a threat? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [GOING SEVENTEEN 2020] EP.5 부승관의 전생연분 #1 (SeungKwan Boo's Past Life Destiny #1)
로하 협박했어요? AROHA is threatening me? 듣기 View video ASTRO : 차은우의 Just one 10 minutes
지금 저 협박하시는 거예요? Are you threatening me now? 듣기 View video Dingo Story / 딩고스토리 : 변태 선생 경찰차에 태우는 법_EP22_[라이크LIKE]
그럼 전에 말한 그 전학 협박은 철회해 주시는 건가요? Then, are you rescinding your threat? 듣기 View video Dingo Story / 딩고스토리 : 교복 입고 콘돔 사러갔을 때 리얼 반응_EP16_[라이크LIKE]
vlive.english: Then, are you rescinding your threat?

vlive.korean: 거의 무릎을 꿇었어요 - 로빈아, 협박당한 거 아니지? almost. - ROBIN, you weren't threatened, were you? 듣기 View video World Klass (월드 클래스) : 🌏 보고싶어서 왔클! 4인실 + 2인실 🌏
vlive.english: almost. - ROBIN, you weren't threatened, were you?

examples.korean: The referee had been threatened and abused. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 심판은 협박을 당하고 욕을 들었었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The referee had been threatened and abused. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: He refused to give in to bullying and threats. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그는 협박과 괴롭힘에 굴복하지 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He refused to give in to bullying and threats. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They were browbeaten into accepting the offer. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 협박을 받고 그 제안을 받아 들였다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They were browbeaten into accepting the offer. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: She refused to be intimidated by their threats. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그녀는 그들의 협박에 겁을 먹지 않았다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: She refused to be intimidated by their threats. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: His voice was soft, yet laden with threat. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그의 목소리는 부드러웠지만 협박을 가득 담고 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: His voice was soft, yet laden with threat. Add to Wordbook
